description: The configuration of a single CronJob.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

metadata.description: Standard object metadata. The `name` can be at most 52 characters long because the CronJob controller will append a 11-character suffix to the name.

spec.description: Specification of the desired behavior of a CronJob, including the schedule.
